sect1.title: News Server
sect1.para: All the mailing lists hosted at &lfs-domainname; are also accessible via the NNTP server. All messages posted to a mailing list will be copied to its correspondent newsgroup. Note, however, that as this is written, it is not possible to write to the mailing lists via the NNTP service.
The news server can be reached at news.&lfs-domainname;.
